title: Lee Si Young shares her beauty secrets with 'Marie Claire' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Lee Si Young shares her beauty secrets with 'Marie Claire' By KpopJoA 5 minutes ago 514 41 0 0 Google+ Actress Lee Si Young revealed her courageous mindset in taking on any challenge that comes her way, reminiscent of her boxing days.
The actress recently spoke with 'Marie Claire' fashion magazine regarding her natural beauty, "I run every morning. This is how I cope with loving myself as well as maintaining a healthy heart and body." 
"I am also happy when I get to rest the next day after working out. It is truly breathtaking to see the sunrise while running." Lee Si Young went on to share how she takes care of her skin, "I use one pack daily and wear a face mask to sleep." 
The actress commented, "Although there are times when I have to step out of my boundary while acting, I always remind myself to keep a positive view on things and just keep pressing forth towards my goal." 
Fans can find out more beauty tips from Lee Si Young in 'Marie Claire's March issue. YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
